distinct.translation[0].definitions[0].d: clearly different or belonging to a different type
distinct.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The learning needs of the two groups are quite distinct from each other.
distinct.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that is distinct can clearly be seen, heard, smelled etc
distinct.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The outline of the ship became more distinct.
distinct.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a distinct possibility, feeling, quality etc definitely exists and cannot be ignored
distinct.translation[0].definitions[2].e: I got the distinct impression he was trying to make me angry.
There is a distinct possibility that this will eventually be needed.
